Name: Sub-Space Cabochon: Up, Up and Away
Desc: A Sub-Space Boulder suspended in the air. It is of moderate size and can be used as a step to ascend to the Floating Platform with proper adjustment of height and spacing. The "Plaustrite" core inlaid in the stone steps is relatively small, and the total number that can be used for arrangement is larger compared to other Floating Platforms.\nIt is said that to some Liyue people, a steadily rising staircase symbolizes "a smooth ascent." Perhaps arranging such stone steps in a clever way can also bring some kind of auspicious omen?
